# Outlier Collection and Mapping

## Introduction

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
## Load Libraries
rm(list = ls())
Libraries = c("doMC", "knitr", "readr")

for(p in Libraries){  # Install Library if not present
    if(!require(p, character.only = TRUE)) { install.packages(p) }
    library(p, character.only = TRUE)
}
opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE)
```

Import data & data handling

*Obtain False-Positive (fp) & False-Negatives from sets:* {-}

## LOGIT set
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
keep <- "rowIndex"

fp_fn_logit <- read_csv("../00-data/outliers/fp_fn_logit.csv")

logit_fp_fn_nums <- sort(unique(unlist(fp_fn_logit[, keep], use.names = FALSE)))

logit_fp_fn_nums

write_csv(x = as.data.frame(logit_fp_fn_nums), 
          path = "../00-data/full_fp_fn_sets/logit_fp_fn_nums.csv")
```
